website_summaries.verdict: This is an effective training collar, not just a corrective shock collar. Dogs of all sizes and breeds respond well to the non-shock options. Use the lowest setting possible.
pros: Beep and vibration modes very effective
Positive results reported after one session
cons: Easy to switch to "shock" mode by mistake

customer_reviews.title: Works great, great warranty.
customer_reviews.text: Love that it has a wide range of vibration and shock settings along with a light up display for the settings. I tested it on myself before putting on my dog to make sure that I wasn't going to hurt him with the shock setting or set the vibration more than needed. My pit responds very well to the vibration. I had a problem with the display on the controller. The company stood behind the product and replaced it free of charge. The lifetime warranty is invaluable. The only negative I would have is that there are not seperate buttons for the functions, just a single mode button to change modes. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: kandk

customer_reviews.title: Thank God!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 of these for my dogs and they worked wonders. I have 3 Australian Cattle dogs and a Chihuahua. One of my Cattle dogs is Cooper. He is very aggressive and has been since we got him at 8 weeks old. We couldn't even put a collar on him. We got the PetTech Shcok Collar and used oven mitts to get it on him. He is like a different dog today. We didn't even have to use the shock setting. He is being trained solely on the vibration mode! We couldn't be happier with our purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Tammy K. Firmbach

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: We have used several collars over the years for our GSK and this one is the least effective for we have to have it all the way up on the vibration setting to have her actually feel it and the shock component that I only use in case of emergency does not work on her at all.
customer_reviews.author: H. Paris

customer_reviews.title: Works but not on Giant breeds
customer_reviews.text: Has a very long battery life, fits pretty good on my Saint Bernard, she is only 71# right now at 5 months, except it barely fases her, not even on 100 with vibration or shock. I know Saints are a stubborn breed, I shocked myself and it definitely works, Might be looking into something for stubborn GIANT dogs. Or I just have a very stubborn dog....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Items boxed wrong.
customer_reviews.text: Did not come with all included parts. Amazon customer support can't seem to help or understand English very well to process a return via phone. I am understanding that Amazon sells millions of items, but please understand that noone is perfect and things get boxed incorrectly. Booklet states item comes with 2 sets of probes. Small probes and a set of large probes. Large probes for longer haired dogs. I received two sets of small. No large and no help from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Dave W.

customer_reviews.title: Can’t beat that lifetime guarantee!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my fifth time purchasing a training collar. I chose this one specifically for the lifetime guarantee. Two of my previous collars I liked, but only lasted less than a year, and the other two I just didn’t like them at all. So far I am really pleased with this one and the power shutting on and off with the remote and the device coming into contact is super nice, because the power on/off buttons broke after prolonged use, and that will never happen. Can’t beat that lifetime guarantee and the company reaching out to you after your purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Wrona

customer_reviews.title: works well but.............
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a collar that would vibrate automatically when my dog barked. I didn't realize that it does not have this feature so I returned it and was promptly issued a refund without any issue. This collar requires you to engage the collar manually each time you want to correct your dog and not automatically as I thought. That said it does seem to work well and vibrates plenty string enough.
customer_reviews.author: Mojony

customer_reviews.title: Does not affect 80 lb German Shepherd
customer_reviews.text: I started at 1 and went one at a time to 100 with no luck it didn't even faze him, all I was looking for was an ear twitch and I didn't even get that. Waste of money sending back.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Worked
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for stopping my dog from barking. Battery didn’t last as long as I thought it would. Vibration mode didn’t do much to distract him so had to go to the shock mode on the lowest setting. Haven’t used it for a couple of days and he hasn’t barked so I think it’s done it’s job!
customer_reviews.author: pookiesmom

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected, overpriced for what it does. The instructions are not good, the photos of the functions are tiny and are so blurred you have to guess. Will most likely send it back
customer_reviews.author: Pferde88

customer_reviews.title: the product is not working the right way
customer_reviews.text: You did not send the longer prongs, and now the controller is not responding to the dog with the collar on. Please replace the product. You said, "This is a life long warranty. Thanks, Bonnie
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Engebritson

customer_reviews.title: Spend your money on lotto tickets, this POS blows
customer_reviews.text: Charged everything up, put the collar on my dog. Nothing. When I hold the remote within 6 inches of the collar it works, anything further it doesn't work, nothing. It is pretty simple, not a lot of moving parts, it does not work. Total piece of chinese made crap.
customer_reviews.author: AGH

customer_reviews.title: Very weak signal and very quiet alert tone
customer_reviews.text: On a flat farm road I tested the range of the unit (I only use the tone feature). Over 100 FEET the receiver didn't react, and yes, receiver and transmitter were fully charged. I know dogs hear better than us, but I could hardly hear it at arms length. Advertised 1,200ft range is a complete joke.
customer_reviews.author: MJP383

customer_reviews.title: Bought two only one works
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these one of these work very well but the other one doesn’t at all the collar or remote have only had them a few months .
customer_reviews.author: sheryl

customer_reviews.title: Worked well
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my dog. The product worked just fine ( I used it on myself just to make sure) but it did not work well for my Husky, his fur was too long to reach the skin. I am on the search for longer probes. But the product works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: Paid $49.99 for this and now it costs 29.99 less 5 %. Wouldn’t bother me but it stopped working 31 days after purchase, which is one day after the return window collapsed. I only tried this once since I purchased it. I didn’t have the time to truly evaluate, my fault. I assumed the product would work, my fault again. I wish it would’ve worked.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas B

customer_reviews.title: Vibration mode stopped barking!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a retired vet tech & have never been a fan of this type of training collar. While I’ll NEVER use the static shock mode for correction, the vibration mode has worked great on our barking dog. She’s very receptive to the vibration & stops barking immediately. I recommend if you intend to use the shock mode, use it on yourself first. I don’t recommend using the shock mode.
customer_reviews.author: B. Free

customer_reviews.title: Does not work!  Do not buy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Put the vibration and shock on 100 and tried it on my arm. Barely felt anything. Don't buy these are crap. Contacting the seller to see if I can get my $ back. The warrantee says they will replace, but if they replace with another the same it does me no good.
customer_reviews.author: frauline

customer_reviews.title: Just stopped working
customer_reviews.text: When I first received the collar, it worked fine. Then, over the summer I did not use it at all. Now that fall has arrived, I wanted to start training again ahead of the season. I charged the control unit and it is now all haywire. The buttons don't react, most of the icons are lit, and it does not communicate the the collar (yes, the collar is charged too...).
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Henderson

customer_reviews.title: works "SOMETIMES"
customer_reviews.text: followed all directions, sometimes the actual shock actually works but most of the time it does NOT work. Of course i tried it on myself before putting it on my dog, when it does work; you absolutely feel it. BUT maybe two out of ten times it actually works. SAVE YOUR MONEY!!!!
customer_reviews.author: george

customer_reviews.title: dog training
customer_reviews.text: The product does what it says, but my issue is I wished the buzz, vibrate and shock buttons were separate so we can toggle back and forth between them, in stead of having to click all the way through till you get to your desired setting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was not powerful enough for my American bulldog to acknowledge
customer_reviews.text: Did not work on my dog so I returned it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works, but with some issues
customer_reviews.text: This product worked well for about 24 hours. However, it was then dropped from a height of about 2 feet onto the floor, which caused something inside to break loose and it stopped working. I contacted PetTech about the issue, and was initially told that the warranty was no longer valid due to the fact that the product had been "mishandled", however after further my further complaint that a 2 foot drop hardly constitutes mishandling, I was granted a replacement. I will update my review after I receive my replacement.
customer_reviews.author: JAS

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't always work
customer_reviews.text: since day 1 it never worked right. I keep having to link it to the remote for the shock function to work. Unfortunately I put it off too long and now I can't return it. At least I'm able to leave a review it deserves.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzyd

customer_reviews.title: It simple to use
customer_reviews.text: The blue one the control always rattle like something loose inside but still works.sometimes it takes more charging than the red one.The red one doesn't rattle
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Cook

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. Stopped working after less than a month. Feels like a cell phone in vibrate ringing (when it did work). Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Dharma

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: We have only had this since June and already the screen has gone blank. We don’t even use it frequently. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Momma Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Only have to use the beep feature to prevent my dog from barking. As soon as it goes on his behavior changes. Best purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Klees

customer_reviews.title: 8 months old barking golden
customer_reviews.text: DONT BUY!!! I tried several attempts, several days, and contacting customer service and NEVER HEARD BACK. My puppy , the first time he felt, "whelped" but soon , he just went back to hi old ways.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get it if you need a beep and shake.
customer_reviews.text: Works as described. Keeps my little Wawa in line. Just using the sound and the shake. Will be buying another for our def Yorkie.
customer_reviews.author: cerealpirate

customer_reviews.title: Dog will either ignore it or undergo agony from it
customer_reviews.text: My dog ignored the vibration feature and using the lowest level shock was too cruel for her and she whimpered and peed all over herself. I'm still searching for a better option to keep her from barking so much.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Lasted only 6 months even though I barely used it.
customer_reviews.text: It worked ok to begin with. I didn't use it everyday but I started to train my dog and over the course of about a week of constant use it stopped working. I left it on my GSD a good part of the day so I can't say if it malfunctioned or my dog got it wet in her water bowl--Either way, it's not a great choice for daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I’m using this collar for a very high strung terrier mix dog. I do not use the “shock” setting and never will. She responds well to the vibration.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Hamlet

customer_reviews.title: STOPPED WORKING 6 Weeks in.
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working 6 weeks after we got it and the return window was only for 30 days. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: My dog just kind of looked at me sideways even at the highest setting. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Firegoddess

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Does not work with my Rottweiler at all. Thanks for the money wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Did not work 😫
customer_reviews.text: Product only made noise and had a light vibration. Wish I could have a refund!
customer_reviews.author: Frazier Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: We recently got a new puppy. We have tried it out a couple days now. The beeping mode and the vibrate mode don’t remotely phase him. I dont want to use the shock mode unless it’s absolutely necessary. Hopefully the beep or vibrate will get his attention sooner or later. The device itself seems to be very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: GMcKeown

customer_reviews.title: Try Something Elsr
customer_reviews.text: Works well at first, then stops 6 months later. Try something else.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: PT0Z1
customer_reviews.text: Works well the vibrateing is nice and the beeping sound is nice too not going to need to use the shocker thank you did not wont to use it I have a 20lb Shih Tzu
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: This collar works great! We have only used it on the vibration mode, but our puppy really pays attention when she feels it! We have a Blue Heeler, so she has lots of energy!
customer_reviews.author: wendy

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work! Get a different brand!
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money stupid thing didnt work at all....couldn't even get it to hook up! Dont waste your money on this brand! Such a let down!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you use the static shock feature, start on very low setting first.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good with the collar. I try to use the vibration setting mostly for now . The beep mode also work to distract from barking as well. I'm using this on our female pit bull since she tends to bark the most. I've only had to use the static shock once so far and it did work on a 8 setting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A little misleading
customer_reviews.text: I had no issues with the product. I returned the product because it was a little misleading in saying that you can train up to two dogs together. After completing the order of then realized that it meant Only the remote is compatible for two receivers. I have two pups so I needed two receivers
customer_reviews.author: Michael McCachern

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t trainsm
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work, even when it’s turned up all the way, my dog doesn’t even react to it, the dog is around 30lbs
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for price
customer_reviews.text: This collar replaced a $400 one that was 5 yrs. old and failed. Only difference is this one good for 1/4 mile, old one 4 miles. 1/4 mile more than enough distance and it has more options. Absolutely love it. The rubber coated probes much more comfortable for my dog also. Thank You
customer_reviews.author: Mark Horvath

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: The handset rattles because the battery is not secured. Works inconsistently in regards to discharging the signal. I would not purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good item fair price
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the collar for 2 months now and although I hit the wrong buttons on occasion when I push correct buttons there is immediate correction. Please with this item
customer_reviews.author: CMH

customer_reviews.title: Great collar
customer_reviews.text: First collar of this type I have ever used and it does not disappoint! Awesome quality!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Ann

customer_reviews.title: Its alright.
customer_reviews.text: The display already is missing part of the numbers on day 3. It does not pair with another collar I have previous same model. Im very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: CmT8833

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't seem to work well on my rottweiler 100 pounds doesn't feel the shock
customer_reviews.author: aaron becerra

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Did take long for my Great Dane to listen better. Make sure the collar is tight enough to register the attention jolt, for my dog it was at 5.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: PetTech PTOZ1
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, price and delivery. Fit my 11 lb yorkie mix perfectly. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: kim siordia

customer_reviews.title: Second collar
customer_reviews.text: I bought this collar and the day after I received it, the shock mode would not work. Contacted Amazon and received a new collar within two days. So far, everything is working correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Love this..been using it for 4 days and my dogs barking has almost stopped completly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great training collar for dogs
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. We use it on vibration for training our German Shepherd and she responds very well to it. The remote is very easy to use and is overall a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my 1 year old, huge, wild frenchie! It definitely gets his attention on just buzz! It’s weird to get it set at first, but once you get it, it’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Julia Santana

customer_reviews.title: Dogs listen
customer_reviews.text: Did not need to zap the dog just vibrate worked great, good training tool
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better then older model
customer_reviews.text: Great product, second one I’ve bought. Nice upgrades from older model, water proof, better built, easer to operate.
customer_reviews.author: norman

customer_reviews.title: Bukakke
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't have an on and off button. Guess I'm old school
customer_reviews.author: Tommy f Morrison

product_meta.title: PetTech PT0Z1 Premium Dog Training Shock Collar, Fully Waterproof, 1200ft Range (Blue)
